import React from 'react' import SectionHeader from './SectionHeader' import picOfMe from '../images/me.jpeg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function HomeAbout() { return (

My name is Signe Koefoed Petersen. I am 26 years old, and i study web development on CPH Business in Lyngby.

I have an AK in multimediadesign from 2018. Here i started learn the basic of html and css. I hardcoded many websites this way and it was there my passion for web development started.

After that, i took a PBA in Design & Business, Comunation design & media to get some theory of how to make a website appeylling to a customer. I finished that last year, but it was'nt enough for me. I did not learn anything about coding, so i knew that i needed to learn that, and now here i am, studying web development.

In my sparetime i work in a webbureau, where i managing a lot of changes on websites for out customers.

) }
